name: button closure towel holder 105
notes:
this pattern is written in standard american terms and rated advanced beginner.

➡️ you may also enjoy the 2 ring version here: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/towel-holders-3-ways-087#

the pattern has been tested and every effort has been made to ensure its accuracy. i am more than happy to help if you have any questions regarding the pattern, please send me a message.
